Citation: Lai, Yunfan and List, Johann-Mattis (2023): Lexical Data for the Historical Comparison of Rgyalrongic Languages [Dataset, Version 1.0]. Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology.
Creator: Lai, Yunfan and List, Johann-Mattis

Name: huntergatherer
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Bowern et al.'s "Hunter - Gatherer Language Database" from 2021
Contributor: Forkel, Robert and Rzymski, Christoph and List, Johann-Mattis and Barrientos, Carlos
Citation: Bowern, Claire, Patience Epps, Jane Hill, and Patrick McConvell. Hunter - Gatherer Language Database. https://huntergatherer.la.utexas.edu/ Accessed 2021-04-27.
Creator: Bowern, Claire and Epps, Patience and Hill, Jane and McConvell, Patrick

Name: listsamplesize
Description: CLDF Dataset derived from List's "Sample Size and Cognate Detection" from 2014
Citation: List, Johann-Mattis (2014): Investigating the impact of sample size on cognate detection. Journal of Language Relationship. 11. 91-102. DOI: https://doi.org/10.31826/jlr-2014-110111
Creator: List, Johann-Mattis

Name: hantganbangime
Description: CLDF dataset accompanying Hantgan and List's "Bangime and Friends" from 2018
Citation: Hantgan, Abbie and List, Johann-Mattis (2018): Bangime. Secret language, language isolate, or language island? Journal of Language Contact.
Creator: Hantgan, Abbie and List, Johann-Mattis

Name: tryonsolomon
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Tryon and Hackman's "Solomon Islands Languages" from 1983
Citation: Tryon, Darrell T. and Hackman, Brian D. (1983): Solomon Islands Languages: An internal classification. Canberra: Pacific Linguistics.
Creator: Tryon, Darrell T. and Hackmann, B. D.

Name: northeuralex
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Dellert et al.'s "NorthEuraLex (Version 0.9)" from 2020
Citation: Dellert, J., Daneyko, T., Münch, A. et al (2020). NorthEuraLex (Version 0.9). Lang Resources and Evaluation. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10579-019-09480-6
Creator: Dellert, Johannes

Name: leeainu
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Lee and Hasegawa's "Evolution of the Ainu Language in Space and Time" from 2013
Citation: Lee Sean, Hasegawa Toshikazu (2013). Evolution of the Ainu Language in Space and Time. PLOS ONE 8(4): e62243. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0062243
Creator: Lee, Sean and Hasegawa, Toshikazu

Name: barlowkilliantomoip
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Barlow and Killian's "Tomoip Wordlist" from 2023
Citation: Barlow, Russell & Killian, Don. 2023. Tomoip wordlist: Based on elicitation sessions with Simon Mangil from Milim village, recorded in Kokopo, East New Britain, October to November 2022. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8435080
Creator: Barlow, Russell and Killian, Don

Name: seifartecheverriboran
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Seifart and Echeverri's "Proto Bora-Muinane" from 2015
Citation: Seifart, Frank and Echeverri, Juán Álvaro. 2015. Proto Bora-Muinane. LIAMES 15(2): 279-311.
Creator: Seifart, Frank and Echeverri, Juan Álvaro

Name: dhakalsouthwesttibetic
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Dhakal et al.'s "South-Western Tibetic" from 2024
Citation: Dhakal, D. N., List, J.-M., Roberts, S. G.(2024) A Phylogenetic Study of South-Western Tibetic. Journal of Language Evolution. https://doi.org/10.1093/jole/lzae008
Creator: Dhakal, Dubi Nanda and List, Johann-Mattis and Roberts, Sean

Name: wangbai
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Wang's "Language Contact and Language Comparison" from 2004
Citation: Wang, Feng (2004): Language contact and language comparison. The case of Bai. PhD thesis. Hong Kong: City University of Hong Kong.
Creator: Wang, Feng

Name: servamalagasy
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Serva's "Dialects of Madagascar" from 2020
Citation: Serva M., Pasquini M. (2020): Dialects of Madagascar, PLoS ONE 15(10).
Creator: Serva, Maurizio and Pasquini, Michele

Name: bowernpny
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Bowern and Atkinson's "Internal Structure of Pama-Nyungan" from 2012
Citation: Bowern, Claire, & Atkinson, Quentin. (2012). Computational Phylogenetics and the Internal Structure of Pama-Nyungan: Dataset [Data set]. Language. http://doi.org/10.1353/lan.2012.0081
Creator: Bowern, Claire

Name: oskolskayatungusic
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Oskolskaya et al.'s "A Bayesian approach to the classification of Tungusic languages" from 2021
Citation: Oskolskaya, S., Koile, E., & Robbeets, M. (2021). A Bayesian approach to the classification of Tungusic languages. Diachronica, 39(1), 128–158. https://doi.org/10.1075/dia.20010.osk
Creator: Oskolskaya, Sofia and Koile, Ezequiel and Robbeets, Martine

Name: idssegmented
Description: CLDF dataset accompanying List's "Inference of Partial Colexifications" from 2023 building on Key and Comrie's "Intercontinental Dictionary Series" from 2021
Citation: List, J.-M. (2023): Inference of partial colexifications from multilingual wordlists. Frontiers in Psychology 14.1156540. 1-10.
Creator: Key, M. R and Comrie, B.

Name: robbeetstriangulation
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Robbeets et al.'s "Triangulation of Transeurasian Languages" from 2021
Citation: Robbeets, M., Bouckaert, R., Conte, M. et al. Triangulation supports agricultural spread of the Transeurasian languages. Nature 599, 616–621 (2021). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-021-04108-8
Creator: Robbeets, Martine

Name: dunnielex
Description: CLDF Dataset derived from Dunn's "IELex" from 2012
Citation: Dunn, Michael (2012): Indo-European Lexical Cognacy Database. Max Planck Institute for Psycholinguistics: Nijmegen.
Creator: Dunn, Michael

Name: kesslersignificance
Description: CLDF Dataset derived from Kessler's "Significance of Wordlists" from 2001
Citation: Kessler, B. (2001): The Significance of Wordlists. CSLI: Stanford.
Creator: Kessler, B.

Name: bantubvd
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Greenhill and Gray's "Bantu Basic Vocabulary Database" from 2015
Citation: Simon Greenhill and Russell Gray, 2015. Bantu Basic Vocabulary Database
Creator: Greenhill, Simon J. and Gray, Russell

Name: wold
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Haspelmath and Tadmor's "World Loanword Database" from 2009
Citation: Haspelmath, Martin & Tadmor, Uri (eds.) 2009. World Loanword Database. Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. (Available online at http://wold.clld.org)
Creator: Haspelmath, Martin and Tadmor, Uri

Name: halenepal
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Hale's "Wordlists in Selected Languages of Nepal" from 1973
Citation: Hale, Austin (1973): Clause, sentences, and discourse patterns in selected languages of Nepal. Kathmandu: Institute of Nepal and Asiatic Studies.
Creator: Hale, Austin

Name: lamanisoic
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Lama's "Subgrouping of Nisoic (Yi) Languages" from 2012
Citation: Lama, Ziwo Q.-F. (2012). Subgrouping of Nisoic (Yi) Languages: A Study from the Perspectives of Shared Innovation and Phylogenetic Estimation. Ph.D. Thesis. The University of Texas at Arlington.
Creator: Lama, Ziwo Q.-F.

Name: ivanisuansu
Description: CLDF dataset derived from Ivani's "Basic Words in Suansu" from 2019
Citation: Ivani, J. K. (2019): A first overview on Suansu, a Tibeto-Burman language from Northeastern India. Talk, held at the 29th conference of the Southeast Asian Linguistic Society (27-29 May, Tokyo). https://zenodo.org/record/3383006
Creator: Ivani, Jessica Katiuscia
